typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TrackID as string,
		TrackName as string,
		Duration as string,
		Album as string,
		TrackURL as string,
		TrackPath as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(Album == Column_1,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
